name: Flail Whale
description:
My submission for GMTK Game Jame 2021.

Hunt the whale in the islands and keep close by once you've gone in for the kill. But beware of the whale's strength, you may get dashed upon the sands.

Some sound effects obtained from https://mixkit.co

Some sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Some sound effects by Mike Koenig from SoundBible.com
